title: Vase, 1924–27
creditline: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
description: Cylindrical body with molded foot ; body wall curves outward toward high, narrow shoulder, above which is straight-sided short neck. Overall mottled ochre glaze; decoration of impressed leaves on stem at front and back, leaves glazed in clear brown. Glaze continues within lip interior, with run-lines visible.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, 1924–27.
1924–27. glazed stoneware. Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds. 1983-10-1.
